DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study Multiple Oral Dosing CG100649
DOC.detailed_description: Data dictionary contains detailed description variable used registry , include source variable , cod information use CTCAE normal range relevant .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 1955 year old . Body weight 50 kg ( male ) 45 kg ( female ) . Body weight must within 20 % ideal body weight height accord ideal body weight table . 2 . No significant congenital/chronic disease . No symptoms physical examination . 3 . Appropriate subject determine past medical history , laboratory test , serology urinalysis . 4 . Be able understand objective , method study , characteristic investigational drug , comply requirement study . Subject must provide write informed consent prior study participation . 1 . History presence liver , kidney , nervous system disease , respiratory disorder , endocrinological disorder , hematooncologic , cardiovascular psychiatric cognitive disorder . 2 . History gastrointestinal disorder ( bleed , ulceration , hemorrhoid , pile ) disorder absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion . 3 . History known hypersensitivity drug include CG100649 . 4 . After take rest sit position 3 minute , subject low blood pressure ( Systolic BP ≤ 90 mmHg Diastolic BP ≤ 50 mmHg ) high blood pressure ( Systolic BP ≥ 150 mmHg Diastolic BP ≥ 100 mmHg ) .
